thread.title: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4
thread.title_full: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4

title: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4
text:
> Sports Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4 Pittsburgh Pirates starter Francisco Liriano pitches against the Cincinnati Reds in the first inning of a baseball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Pittsburgh. (AP Photo/Keith Srakocic) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
